001/*

005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.FunctionUtils;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.regex.RegexUtil;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.regex.RegularExpressionMetapathException;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IBooleanItem;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IStringItem;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
020
021import java.util.List;
022import java.util.regex.Pattern;
023import java.util.regex.PatternSyntaxException;
024
025import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
026import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
027
028/**
029 * Implements the XPath 3.1 <a href=
030 * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-matches">fn:matches</a>
031 * functions.
032 */
033public final class FnMatches {
034  @NonNull
035  private static final String NAME = "matches";
036  // CPD-OFF
037  @NonNull
038  static final IFunction SIGNATURE_TWO_ARG = IFunction.builder()
039      .name(NAME)
040      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS)
041      .deterministic()
042      .contextIndependent()
043      .focusIndependent()
044      .argument(IArgument.builder()
045          .name("input")
046          .type(IStringItem.class)
047          .zeroOrOne()
048          .build())
049      .argument(IArgument.builder()
050          .name("pattern")
051          .type(IStringItem.class)
052          .one()
053          .build())
054      .returnType(IBooleanItem.class)
055      .returnOne()
056      .functionHandler(FnMatches::executeTwoArg)
057      .build();
058
059  @NonNull
060  static final IFunction SIGNATURE_THREE_ARG = IFunction.builder()
061      .name(NAME)
062      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS)
063      .deterministic()
064      .contextIndependent()
065      .focusIndependent()
066      .argument(IArgument.builder()
067          .name("input")
068          .type(IStringItem.class)
069          .zeroOrOne()
070          .build())
071      .argument(IArgument.builder()
072          .name("pattern")
073          .type(IStringItem.class)
074          .one()
075          .build())
076      .argument(IArgument.builder()
077          .name("flags")
078          .type(IStringItem.class)
079          .one()
080          .build())
081      .returnType(IBooleanItem.class)
082      .returnOne()
083      .functionHandler(FnMatches::executeThreeArg)
084      .build();
085  // CPD-ON
086
087  @NonNull
088  private static ISequence<IBooleanItem> executeTwoArg(
089      @SuppressWarnings("unused") @NonNull IFunction function,
090      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
091      @SuppressWarnings("unused") @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
092      @SuppressWarnings("unused") IItem focus) {
093    IStringItem input = FunctionUtils.asTypeOrNull(arguments.get(0).getFirstItem(true));
094    IStringItem pattern = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(FunctionUtils.asTypeOrNull(arguments.get(1).getFirstItem(true)));
095
096    return execute(input, pattern, IStringItem.valueOf(""));
097  }
098
099  @NonNull
100  private static ISequence<IBooleanItem> executeThreeArg(
101      @SuppressWarnings("unused") @NonNull IFunction function,
102      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
103      @SuppressWarnings("unused") @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
104      @SuppressWarnings("unused") IItem focus) {
105    IStringItem input = FunctionUtils.asTypeOrNull(arguments.get(0).getFirstItem(true));
106    IStringItem pattern = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(FunctionUtils.asTypeOrNull(arguments.get(1).getFirstItem(true)));
107    IStringItem flags = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(FunctionUtils.asTypeOrNull(arguments.get(2).getFirstItem(true)));
108
109    return execute(input, pattern, flags);
110  }
111
112  @NonNull
113  private static ISequence<IBooleanItem> execute(
114      @Nullable IStringItem input,
115      @NonNull IStringItem pattern,
116      @NonNull IStringItem flags) {
117    return input == null
118        ? ISequence.empty()
119        : ISequence.of(
120            IBooleanItem.valueOf(
121                fnMatches(input.asString(), pattern.asString(), flags.asString())));
122  }
123
124  /**
125   * Implements <a href=
126   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-matches">fn:matches</a>.
127   *
128   * @param input
129   *          the string to match against
130   * @param pattern
131   *          the regular expression to use for matching
132   * @param flags
133   *          matching options
134   * @return {@code true} if the pattern matches or {@code false} otherwise
135   */
136  public static boolean fnMatches(@NonNull String input, @NonNull String pattern, @NonNull String flags) {
137    try {
138      return Pattern.compile(pattern, RegexUtil.parseFlags(flags))
139          .matcher(input).find();
140    } catch (PatternSyntaxException ex) {
141      throw new RegularExpressionMetapathException(
142          RegularExpressionMetapathException.INVALID_EXPRESSION,
143          "Invalid regular expression pattern: '" + pattern + "'",
144          ex);
145    } catch (IllegalArgumentException ex) {
146      throw new RegularExpressionMetapathException(
147          RegularExpressionMetapathException.INVALID_FLAG,
148          "Invalid regular expression flags: '" + flags + "'",
149          ex);
150    }
151  }
152
153  private FnMatches() {
154    // disable construction
155  }
156}
